duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide care to adult and geriatric patients with a focus on orthopedic surgery and care of the bariatric patient.
Utilize appropriate time management skills and communicate effectively.
Document professional developmental activities and knowledge of critical paths.
Floating to areas where staffing is needed.
Passing Telemetry Competency Exam within 90 days of beginning the position.

education_certification.credential: Current Massachusetts RN License, Evidence of Continuing Education
